translations: v．突然改变方向，尤指为了避开某物或某人。
· The car zigs and zags through the traffic.
汽车在交通中突然改变方向。

sentences.sentence: Instead of tending to just one bus, he zigs and zags through the diagram, fanning out from the corner as shown below.
sentences.translation: 如下图所示，他的方法不是仅仅针对一车的人，而是走之字形策略，从一角开始，所牵涉的人成扇形散布开来。
